title: Apfel
description: At lunch you can enjoy a delicious buffet with salads, hot dishes, desserts and juices. The lunch menu changes daily and offers dishes such as grilled tofu, beet gnocchi, and Brazilian specialties like feijoada vatapd and other vegetarian meals. Lunch buffet price is all-you-can-eat Mon-Fri R$24, Sat-Sun R$28. Also open for dinner with a different menu and a la carte. Confirmed open Dec 2013.
